title: must receive an empty list of permissions in response when Solicitor user doesn't have any access
specs: an active Solicitor profile in CCD with a specific variation of ACLs on a case type
an active solicitor profile with another specific variation of ACLs on the same case type
an active Solicitor profile having full permissions on the same case type
has the case id just created where a document id is associated
contains active Solicitor profile who does not have any access
contains an HTTP 200 OK status code
contains the document metadata and an empty list of permissions
